paging.algorithms

Class LRU

  • java.lang.Object
    • paging.algorithms.BasePagingAlgorithm
      • paging.algorithms.LRU

  • public class LRU
extends BasePagingAlgorithm
    This class runs simulation for LRU paging algorithm
    Author:
    Arkadiusz Maruszczak

    • Method Detail

      • startProcessing

        private void startProcessing()
        Begins paging.

        This method executes BasePagingAlgorithm.createPages(), executePages() and BasePagingAlgorithm.setPageFaults(double, boolean...)

      • executePages

        protected void executePages()
        Implements method from super class.

        Method loops through all pages in reference list BasePagingAlgorithm.referenceList and increments page faults BasePagingAlgorithm.amntPageFault every time that it's representing frame is not present in memory BasePagingAlgorithm.memoryQueue.

        Specified by:
        executePages in class BasePagingAlgorithm

      • setOthersAge

        private Frame[] setOthersAge(int memoryListIndex,
                             Frame[] memoryQueue)
        Sets age of elements in memory array on indexes that are not equal to given one.
        Parameters:
        memoryListIndex - index of element that we don't want to be changed
        memoryQueue - array of frames in memory
        Returns:
        fixed array of frames in memory

      • getLeastRecentlyUsed

        protected int getLeastRecentlyUsed(Frame[] array,
                                   int rangeOfFramesInMemory)
        Gets index of element which was least recently used
        Specified by:
        getLeastRecentlyUsed in class BasePagingAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        array - array of frames in memory
        rangeOfFramesInMemory - amount of elements that we search in
        Returns:
        index of element that was leas recently used
